DataElement.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Cancer Progression First Diagnosis Year Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the year that disease recurrence was first diagnosed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Recurrent Disease Cancer Progression First Diagnosis
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the initial identification of the reappearance or advancement in extent or severity of cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Concepts.definition: The return of a disease after a period of remission.

Property.preferredDefinition: The worsening of a cancer over time.:Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

Concepts.definition: A pathologic process in which alterations at the molecular level result in a more aggressive cytologic and phenotypic profile and clinical course of a malignant neoplasm.
Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the response criteria (includes RECIST and others) and associated documentation of disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: Something that happens at a given place and time.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
